long_description: Keep your toothbrush (sold separately) germ free with this package of 2 Steripod Toothbrush sanitizers. Steripod sanitizer clips onto the head of your toothbrush and constantly releases germ fighting vapors; once opened, each Steripod lasts up to 3 months. Fits most standard and electric toothbrushes; protects your toothbrush from soap, dirt and hair while traveling. Steripod Toothbrush sanitizers are nontoxic. Package of 2.
short_description: Keep your toothbrush (sold separately) germ free with this package of 2 Steripod Toothbrush sanitizers.
